Name: Introduction to Python Programming
Subject: Computer Science
Description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming language from scratch. This course covers basic syntax, data types, control structures, functions, and more.

Name: Web Development with React
Subject: Web Development
Description: Master the art of building web applications using React framework. This course covers React fundamentals, component-based architecture, state management, and more.

Name: Data Science Fundamentals
Subject: Data Science
Description: Explore the core concepts of data science including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. This course covers statistical analysis, data manipulation, predictive modeling, and more.

Name: Mobile App Development with Flutter
Subject: Mobile Development
Description: Build cross-platform mobile apps using Google's Flutter framework. This course covers Flutter basics, UI design, state management, and more.

Name: Graphic Design Fundamentals
Subject: Design
Description: Learn the basics of graphic design including color theory, typography, and layout. This course covers design principles, Adobe Photoshop basics, vector graphics, and more.

Name: Introduction to Machine Learning
Subject: Machine Learning
Description: Get started with machine learning algorithms and techniques. This course covers supervised learning, unsupervised learning, regression, classification, and more.

Name: Photography Basics
Subject: Photography
Description: Master the basics of photography including composition, lighting, and exposure. This course covers camera settings, exposure triangle, composition rules, and more.

Name: Android App Development with Kotlin
Subject: Mobile Development
Description: Create powerful Android apps using Kotlin programming language. This course covers Kotlin syntax, Android Studio, app development lifecycle, and more.

Name: Introduction to Cybersecurity
Subject: Cybersecurity
Description: Understand the fundamentals of cybersecurity and protect against cyber threats. This course covers network security, cryptography, ethical hacking, and more.

Name: Python for Data Analysis
Subject: Data Science
Description: Utilize Python for data manipulation, analysis, and visualization. This course covers pandas, NumPy, data cleaning, data visualization libraries, and more.

Name: Frontend Web Development
Subject: Web Development
Description: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build modern websites. This course covers HTML5, CSS3, responsive design, JavaScript ES6, and more.

Name: iOS App Development with Swift
Subject: Mobile Development
Description: Develop feature-rich iOS apps using Apple's Swift programming language. This course covers Swift basics, UIKit, SwiftUI, app deployment, and more.

Name: Artificial Neural Networks
Subject: Machine Learning
Description: Understand the working of artificial neural networks and deep learning algorithms. This course covers perceptrons, feedforward neural networks, backpropagation, and more.

Name: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
Subject: Marketing
Description: Master the basics of digital marketing including SEO, SEM, and social media marketing. This course covers keyword research, ad campaigns, content marketing strategies, and more.

Name: Introduction to AR/VR
Subject: Virtual Reality
Description: Explore the world of virtual reality and immersive technologies. This course covers augmented reality, virtual reality devices, 360-degree videos, and more.

Name: Java Programming Basics
Subject: Computer Science
Description: Learn the basics of Java programming language for beginners. This course covers Java syntax, object-oriented programming principles, data structures, and more.

Name: UX/UI Design Principles
Subject: Design
Description: Master the principles of user experience and user interface design. This course covers usability, wireframing, prototyping, design thinking, and more.

Name: Introduction to Deep Learning
Subject: Machine Learning
Description: Explore deep learning algorithms and neural networks. This course covers convolutional neural networks, recurrent neural networks, deep reinforcement learning, and more.

Name: Introduction to Cloud Computing
Subject: Cloud Computing
Description: Learn the basics of cloud computing and popular cloud platforms. This course covers cloud service models, deployment models, AWS, Azure, and more.

Name: C++ Programming Essentials
Subject: Computer Science
Description: Get started with C++ programming language and object-oriented programming concepts. This course covers C++ syntax, classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and more.
